commands.name: devices
commands.description: Lists the devices registered on the user's account

commands.name: query
commands.description: Returns data about the state of a device

commands.name: turn
commands.description: Turn a device on or off

commands.name: brightness
commands.description: Alter the brightness of a device

commands.name: color
commands.description: Alter the color of a device

commands.name: help
commands.description: Lists a list of commands and information about the CLI
